wikipedia_page.main: Helen Violet Carolyn Delfont, Baroness Delfont (née Heyman; 16 September 1918 – 17 January 2008), known professionally as Carole Lynne, was a British theatre actress, best known for her work in the 1940s and 1950s.  She was the widow of the impresario Lord Bernard Delfont, a prominent figure in the British entertainment industry.
